source to storage (parquet)

[Process Stream Code = SRC2ADLS]

activities.name: Determine Source Pipeline
activities.description:
Default = SQL On-Prem
1 = FinOps to ADLS (not required)
2 = Oracle
3 = Azure SQL
4 = SQL Server
5 = CSV 
6 = MS Access
7 = Sharepoint 
8 = Power BI Admin Api
9 = Azure Cost Api
10 = MySQL - AzureMySQL
11 = PostgreSQL - AzurePostgreSQL
